title: Kremlin says Europe will feel the recoil from its 'illegal' sanctions on Russia
summary: – Russia's invasion of Ukraine in 2022 triggered a wave of Western sanctions on Russia, and the West said that it hoped its sanctions would force President Vladimir Putin to seek peace in Ukraine, reports Reuters.
